title: Mystery gift refunding
body: So...i think it would a great idea if you could refund mystery gifts for 100RP. Because lets be honest. when you have Zombie brand why would you ever play Apocalypse brand?  it'd be great for both riot and the players. that way i can give mystery gifting another round and i don't have a skin that i'm never going to use.  Opinions?

replies.body:
no. 

buy the one you want if mystery is too confusing for you.
My point is that i already have the skin i want so when i get another skin for that champion, a skin i don't want. i'd like to be able to get a 100 Rp refund.
